secure.title: Secure Platform

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about using Bright Ears

q1.question: How much does it cost to use Bright Ears?
q1.answer: Bright Ears is completely free for customers. We don't charge any commission fees - you pay the artist directly.

q2.question: Are all artists verified?
q2.answer: Yes, all artists go through our verification process including identity verification and portfolio review.

q3.question: How do I communicate with artists?
q3.answer: You can message artists directly through our secure platform to discuss your event details and requirements.

q4.question: What if I need to cancel my booking?
q4.answer: Cancellation policies vary by artist. Please check the specific terms when booking and contact support if needed.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied customers who found their perfect entertainment

howItWorksArtists.title: How It Works for Artists
howItWorksArtists.description: Join Thailand's premier entertainment booking platform and start earning more with zero commission fees

hero.badge: Zero Commission â€¢ Premium Clients â€¢ Instant Payments
hero.title: Earn More with Zero Commission
hero.subtitle: Join 500+ Bangkok artists getting direct bookings from hotels, venues, and corporate events
hero.stat: Artists earn 30% more on average vs. traditional platforms

steps.title: 5 Steps to Success
steps.subtitle: From signup to getting paid - here's how it works

signup.title: Sign Up Free (0% Commission)
signup.details: No signup fees, no monthly costs, no hidden charges. Ever. Unlike other platforms charging 15-30% commission, Bright Ears is 100% free for artists. You keep everything you earn.

verification.title: Get Verified in 24 Hours
verification.description: ID + Police Check = Trust from Premium Clients
verification.details: Our verification process opens doors to corporate events and luxury venues. Premium clients book verified artists 5x more.

pricing.title: Set Your Rates
pricing.details: Set hourly rates, minimum hours, travel fees - your rules. No platform dictating your worth. Charge what you deserve and adjust anytime based on demand.

bookings.title: Get Direct Bookings
bookings.details: Hotels, venues, and event planners browse and book. Access to Bangkok's largest network of corporate clients. No bidding wars, no race to the bottom pricing.

payment.title: Get Paid Instantly
payment.details: Deposits paid upfront, balance on completion. No waiting 30 days for payouts. Get paid via PromptPay instantly when booking is confirmed.

benefits.title: The Bright Ears Advantage
benefits.subtitle: Built for artists, by people who understand the entertainment industry

commission.title: Zero Commission Forever
commission.description: Keep 100% of your earnings. No hidden fees, no surprises. What you charge is what you earn.

clients.title: Premium Client Access
clients.description: Direct bookings from 500+ Bangkok hotels and corporate venues. Access to high-quality clients who value professional entertainment.

support.title: Professional Support
support.description: 24/7 Thai/English support, booking protection, payment guarantee. We've got your back.

comparison.title: Us vs. Traditional Platforms
comparison.subtitle: Compare and see why thousands of artists are switching to Bright Ears

testimonials.title: What Artists Are Saying
testimonials.djNatcha: I earn à¸¿50,000 more per month since joining. Zero commission means I can finally save for my studio.
testimonials.theGroove: Corporate clients trust verified artists. We get booked 3x more now.
